summary: Test suite for the pass‑through proxy layer that forwards requests to external AI services. It validates that the proxy correctly relays Anthropic and Vertex AI API calls, handles both standard and streaming completions, respects custom headers, caches endpoint context, and records spend logs when client‑side credentials are used.
business_intent: Guarantee that the proxy reliably forwards AI service requests while preserving functionality such as streaming, header propagation, credential handling, caching, and billing logging, thereby maintaining seamless integration with third‑party AI providers.
